blockasn-usertypeblockreason: Block reason displayed to users who belong to a configured group, such as hosting, business or residential. $1 is the user type (e.g. hosting, business, residential) and cannot be translated at this time.
blockasn-asnblockreason: Block reason displayed to users who belong to a blocked Autonomous System Number (ASN).
blockasn-proxyblockreason: Block reason displayed to users who are using an IP anonymizer or VPN service.
